price: A lõkacin da waɗanda aka bi suka barranta daga waɗanda suka bi, kuma suka ga azãba, kuma sabubba suka yanke da su.
arabic: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَابُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh tabarra-a alladhīna ittubiʿū mina alladhīna ittabaʿū wara-awū al-ʿadhāba wataqaṭṭaʿat bihimu al-asbābu
